author: sagarbansal21
content: They are elated to announce their recent collaboration with Cookie3, a project pioneering smart analytics for Web3 and the Metaverse. They believe that the combination of the respective areas of expertise, security and analytics can create a force multiplier that will push blockchain and the evolution of the internet forward.Hypersign will utilize the Cookie3 analytics API to strengthen HyperFyre’s Sybil resistance. Cookie3 will, in turn, use HyperFyre for their upcoming community-building events and are keen to explore the entirety of Hypersign’s developing product suite for a wide variety of use-cases such as the authentication of their API dashboards and more.Learn more: https://medium.com/hypersign/hypersign-partners-with-cookie3-for-data-security-and-deep-analytics-9b870476b1c7

comments.body: We use weak passwords or keep them in dangerous places, putting our personal information at risk. On the other hand, projects like Hypersign symbolising passwordless authentication and paving the path for cryptographic authentication making the passwords become obsolete.Learn more: http://www.hypersign.id
